desc: Handcrafted Whipped Shea butter by me. All ingredients are natural with no chemicals or dyes. Product is child friendly as well. Multi-purposeful for use of face and body moisturizer, hair cream/butter, treats dry skin, insect bites, inflammation, low grade SPF, reduces wrinkles and stretch marks.

layout.text: Summer calls for glowing skin and here’s what you need:

Summer Dew is a refreshing yet sexy fragrance of honey dew and coconut cream. This wonderful blend of fruit and sugar gives off a tropical blend of a delicious body oil. Your skin will be glowing and heads will be turning.
